sentences: Õigus võõrandada vara kuulus tema õigust.
context: The word 'õigust' is the translative case form of the Estonian noun 'õigus'. It means 'as a right' or 'in the capacity/right of'. This case indicates transformation into something, so it suggests someone becoming or acting in the role/right of something else. It's commonly used to indicate that someone has rights or authority in certain situations.
